channel.title: How do i change the way someone types such as the color?
channel.description: Hi, i have been trying to figure out how to change that ugly yellow words to a different color when i talk. i have a 508 and i hope someone can help me because im confused.

item.title: How do i change the way someone types such as the color?
item.dc:creator: @l0gin1 l0gin.
item.description:
@l0gin1 wrote:

Where it sends where someone chats it should have @yel@ in either the packet or somewhere else in your server files

you could just search all files for @yel@ and see where itâ€™ll come up and just remove it/change to whatever colour you want
